column2:
**gln** (mandatory) String (13) - the GLN number of the organization that is associated with the authorized user of the EDIN 2.0 platform at the account level

OR

**guid** (mandatory) String - unique identifier of the organization on the EDIN 2.0 platform

**doc_uuid** (mandatory) UUID - document ID

The body of the request method transfers `additional fields (fields of extraparameters) <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/UpdateExtraFieldsRequest.html>`__. Example `CONDRA indexing <https://wiki.edin.ua/en/latest/integration_2_0/APIv2/Methods/EveryBody/UpdateExtraFieldsCondra.html>`__
